scripts.start-app: concurrently -n react,express -c black.bgCyan,black.bgGreen --kill-others "cd react-app && npm run dev" "cd express && npm run start:nodemon"
scripts.npm-install_start-app: npm i && concurrently -n react,express -c black.bgCyan,black.bgGreen --kill-others "cd react-app && npm i && npm run dev" "cd express && npm i && npm run start:nodemon"
